message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $100?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
I can do better than that, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth a bit more than that. How about we try $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we try $95?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting the product, so I'm willing to make one more offer. How about we try $105?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still want the product. My final offer is $102. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I've already gone a bit lower than I'm comfortable with. I'm not willing to go any lower than $110, so I'm afraid I'll have to reject your offer. I'm going to have to consider selling the product to someone else.
